title: Apple Announces MacBook Air Now Starts With Increased 16GB of RAM
content:
Apple today in its new MacBook Pro press release announced that the MacBook Air lineup now starts with 16GB of RAM, up from 8GB previously.


In the U.S., the MacBook Air lineup continues to start at $999, so there is no price increase associated with this RAM increase.

More details to follow.
